captions.text:
You are smiling at me 
all day in my head

Do you think 
about me sometimes

I can’t go to sleep 
thinking about you

I love alone 
Feel sad and feel like crying
My heart might hurt too

But that day will come 
to me too

That day to love 
If I keep on wishing

Do you know hating someone 
Because you love her so much

How come you don’t know 
this stupid me
Why is love so harsh to me
You’re the only one I want

I love alone 
Feel sad and feel like crying

My heart might hurt too
But that day will come to me too

That day to love 
If I keep on wishing

Do you know hating someone 
Because you love her so much

How come you don’t 
know this stupid me

I get a step closer 
you get further away

You don’t know how I feel
I love you

One day you’ll look for me 
One day you’ll know me
I’m right behind you

Do you know hating someone 
Because you love her so much

How come you don’t 
know this stupid me

If I can love you
It’s okay to lose everything

I’m okay 
How come you don’t know

title: [MV] Kim Jong Kook(김종국) _ How come You don't know?(모르나요) (Good Doctor(굿닥터) OST Part.5)

comments.text:
This are some of the list that you may not know about RM members.

JK - Singer(formerly from Turbo,mikey currently in US,Haha normally took 
his role in rap)

JK is famous for his trademark loveline with Yoon Eun Hye.

JK niece is also a singer.he being featured in one of her song.His Niece is 
Soya.

Suk Jin - formerly a singer.only remembered he release 2 songs.can be found 
in youtube.

Jihyo - actress(close friend with Lee Dongwook)

Kwangsoo - actor(has acted many roles,bestfriend with Joongki)

Jaesuk - MC & comedian(Had been the most nominated for Daesang.)(Is still 
appearing in 3 different channel,KBS,SBS,MBC)

Haha - reggae singer,used to be an actor(he acted in who my teacher) & 
comedian.

Currently Haha is in 3 show(RM,Infinite Challenge & Invisible Man.)

Gary - Rapper(From LeeSsang,Both Gary & Gil own a restaurant)

﻿

comments.author: MissLollo Ka

comments.text:
Do you really not know what he has? It's not a disease, nor should it be 
treated like one. It's quite obvious that he is autistic....and like most 
autistic persons, lacks the ability interact with others normally. Social 
interactions are very difficult for them because their brain has certain 
switch turned on and off compared to the average human being. Some have 
more drastic autism than others but it's not a disease, it's a disorder.
